import React from 'react'; const UpdateForm = ({ updateData, changeHolder, updateTask, cancelUpdate }) => { const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; changeHolder({ ...updateData, [name]: value }); // Update the specific field in updateData }; return ( <>
